officialTitle: Combined General and Spinal Anesthesia vs. Combined General and Spinal Anesthesia With Neuromuscular Blockade for Operative Repair of Hip Fractures
inclusionCriteria:
* ASA I-IV Age 55 or older Scheduled for operative repair of isolated intertrochanteric hip fracture
* Must have minimum age of 55 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Inability to consent/refusal Allergy to any of the study medications Multiple traumatic injuries Contraindication to neuraxial or general anesthesia Pregnancy
